definition: (of a deceased) during one's life/while living
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: The good he did will live after him.
sentences.chinese: 他生前做的好事将永留人世。

sentences.english: According to his own testimony, he was 197 years old.
sentences.chinese: 根据他自己生前的陈述来看，这位老人活了197岁。

sentences.english: The good which he did will live after him.
sentences.chinese: 他生前做的好事将永留人世。

sentences.english: But Koontz is only charged during his lifetime, yet without a trial.
sentences.chinese: 但昆茨生前仅被起诉，尚没有经过审判。

sentences.english: Both men were U.S. Marines assigned to Alpha Company, Battalion 1/8.
sentences.chinese: 两人生前均服役于美国海军陆战队8团1营A连。

sentences.english: Michael Jackson images dominate opening of death trial.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊死亡案再开庭，其生前照片令人揪心不已。

sentences.english: He did so much for his fans," Powell said.
sentences.chinese: 他生前为他的歌迷做了太多的事。

sentences.english: Her father was a quiet self-contained man.
sentences.chinese: 她父亲生前是个好静而独立自主的人。

sentences.english: Before Musa died, he had talked to Rosenberg about whether to accept the positions.
sentences.chinese: 穆萨生前曾与罗森博格谈及是否接受这些位置。

sentences.english: These are less living wills than examples of prestructured euthanasia.
sentences.chinese: 这些与其说是生前遗嘱，不如说是提前安排的安乐死。

sentences.english: When they are idle, they are confused with the problems before birth and after death.
sentences.chinese: 闲时又为了生前与死后的问题而困扰不休。

sentences.english: In the last week of his life, we talked twice on the telephone.
sentences.chinese: 在他生前的最后一个星期里，我与他通了两次电话。

sentences.english: I could feel that, mother had always leafed over those photos.
sentences.chinese: 我是能够感觉的，母亲生前经常翻看这些照片。

sentences.english: Collections of Roaring Songs is a collection of poems edited by Mr.
sentences.chinese: 《啸歌集》是作者生前编选的诗歌结集。

sentences.english: The speeches from Jobs turned to hot spot again and again.
sentences.chinese: 乔布斯生前地演讲成为大师几回再三转评地热点。

sentences.english: The magnate was murdered at a gathering of relatives and friends.
sentences.chinese: 生前众叛亲离的富豪在亲友聚会中遇害。

definition: approaching one's end/with one foot in the grave
to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
on one's deathbed/at the point of death
words of the deceased/last words of the dying/wisdom of past sages
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
